TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinqDataSourceUpdateEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks 物件會傳遞給任何事件處理常式事件。The object is passed to any event handler for the event. 您可以使用來在資料來源執行更新作業之前檢查資料的物件。You can use the object to examine the data before the update operation is executed in the data source. 您可以再驗證資料、 檢查資料類別中，所擲回驗證例外狀況或變更更新之前的值。You can then validate the data, examine validation exceptions thrown by the data class, or change a value before the update. 您也可以取消更新作業。You can also cancel the update operation. 物件包含原先從資料來源擷取的資料。The object contains the data that was originally retrieved from the data source. 物件包含更新作業將會儲存在資料來源的資料。The object contains the data that will be saved in the data source during the update operation. 代表資料來源的物件，則會擲回驗證例外狀況之前更新的資料，如果屬性包含的執行個體類別。If the object that represents the data source throws a validation exception before updating the data, the property contains an instance of the class. 您可以擷取到的所有驗證例外狀況屬性。You can retrieve all the validation exceptions through the property. 如果沒有驗證例外狀況，屬性包含`null`。If no validation exception is thrown, the property contains `null`. 如果您處理驗證例外狀況，並不想要重新擲回的例外狀況，設定屬性設`true`。If you handle the validation exceptions and do not want the exception to be re-thrown, set the property to `true`. 根據預設，原始值的資料來源檢視中的控制存放區狀態在網頁上，除了其屬性會標示為`UpdateCheck.Never`。By default, the control stores the original values from the data source in view state on the Web page, except those whose attribute is marked as `UpdateCheck.Never`. LINQ to SQL 會自動檢查更新資料之前的資料的完整性。LINQ to SQL automatically checks the integrity of the data before updating the data. 它會藉由比較資料來源中的目前值與儲存檢視狀態中的原始值。It does this by comparing the current values in the data source with the original values stored in view state. 如果資料來源中的值已變更，LINQ to SQL 會引發例外狀況。LINQ to SQL raises an exception if the values in the data source have changed. 您可以執行額外的資料驗證所建立的處理常式事件。You can perform additional data validation by creating a handler for the event. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 此範例顯示如何比較屬性從屬性和屬性來判斷是否中的值`Category`屬性已變更。The example shows how to compare properties from the property and the property to determine whether the value in the `Category` property has changed. 如果是的話`CategoryChanged`屬性中的物件屬性設定為`true`。If so, the `CategoryChanged` property of the object in the property is set to `true`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating/cs/Default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating/vb/Default.aspx.vb#1)] 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 它藉由顯示任何驗證例外狀況訊息控制項。It displays any validation exception messages by using a control. ```vb Protected Sub LinqDataSource_Updating(ByVal sender As Object, _ ByVal e As LinqDataSourceUpdateEventArgs) If (e.Exception IsNot Nothing) Then For Each innerException As KeyValuePair(Of String, Exception) _ In e.Exception.InnerExceptions Label1.Text &= innerException.Key & ": " & _ innerException.Value.Message & "
" Next e.ExceptionHandled = True End If End Sub ``` ```csharp protected void LinqDataSource_Updating(object sender, LinqDataSourceUpdateEventArgs e) { if (e.Exception != null) { foreach (KeyValuePair innerException in e.Exception.InnerExceptions) { Label1.Text += innerException.Key + ": " + innerException.Value.Message + "
"; } e.ExceptionHandled = true; } } ```

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果在執行更新作業之前，會引發驗證例外狀況，例外狀況會儲存在屬性。If a validation exception is raised before the update operation is performed, the exception is stored in the property. 中的事件處理常式事件，您可以擷取透過例外狀況屬性。In an event handler for the event, you can retrieve the exception through the property. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 它藉由顯示任何驗證例外狀況訊息控制項。It displays any validation exception messages by using a control. ```vb Protected Sub LinqDataSource_Updating(ByVal sender As Object, _ ByVal e As LinqDataSourceUpdateEventArgs) If (e.Exception IsNot Nothing) Then For Each innerException As KeyValuePair(Of String, Exception) _ In e.Exception.InnerExceptions Label1.Text &= innerException.Key & ": " & _ innerException.Value.Message & "
" Next e.ExceptionHandled = True End If End Sub ``` ```csharp protected void LinqDataSource_Updating(object sender, LinqDataSourceUpdateEventArgs e) { if (e.Exception != null) { foreach (KeyValuePair innerException in e.Exception.InnerExceptions) { Label1.Text += innerException.Key + ": " + innerException.Value.Message + "
"; } e.ExceptionHandled = true; } } ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExceptionHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否處理了例外狀況以及是否不應再度擲回此例外狀況。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the exception was handled and that it should not be thrown again.

value.span: 如果例外狀況已處理則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the exception was handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 您可以建立的事件處理常式事件，以檢查更新作業之前發生的驗證例外狀況。You can create an event handler for the event to examine validation exceptions that occurred before the update operation. 如果您處理的例外狀況，並不想要再次擲回，設定屬性設`true`。If you handle the exception and do not want it to be thrown again, set the property to `true`. 如果您未設定屬性設`true`，例外狀況會傳播到呼叫堆疊中的下一個事件處理常式。If you do not set the property to `true`, the exception will be propagated to the next event handler in the call stack. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 它藉由顯示任何驗證例外狀況訊息控制項。It displays any validation exception messages by using a control. ```vb Protected Sub LinqDataSource_Updating(ByVal sender As Object, _ ByVal e As LinqDataSourceUpdateEventArgs) If (e.Exception IsNot Nothing) Then For Each innerException As KeyValuePair(Of String, Exception) _ In e.Exception.InnerExceptions Label1.Text &= innerException.Key & ": " & _ innerException.Value.Message & "
" Next e.ExceptionHandled = True End If End Sub ``` ```csharp protected void LinqDataSource_Updating(object sender, LinqDataSourceUpdateEventArgs e) { if (e.Exception != null) { foreach (KeyValuePair innerException in e.Exception.InnerExceptions) { Label1.Text += innerException.Key + ": " + innerException.Value.Message + "
"; } e.ExceptionHandled = true; } } ```

summary.span: 取得物件，該物件包含會儲存在資料來源中的值。

span.span: Gets the object that contains the values that will be saved in the data source.

value.span: 屬性中指定之型別的物件，包含要儲存的資料。

span.span: An object of the type specified in the property that contains the data to save.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立事件處理常式事件，並擷取來驗證資料的屬性。Create an event handler for the event and retrieve the property to validate the data. 您也可以變更的資料，或取消更新作業。You can also change the data or cancel the update operation. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 此範例顯示如何比較屬性從屬性和屬性來判斷是否中的值`Category`屬性已變更。The example shows how to compare properties from the property and the property to determine whether the value in the `Category` property has changed. 如果是的話`CategoryChanged`屬性中的物件屬性設定為`true`。If so, the `CategoryChanged` property of the object in the property is set to `true`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating/cs/Default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating/vb/Default.aspx.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得物件，這個物件包含原先從資料來源擷取的資料。

span.span: Gets the object that contains the values that were originally retrieved from the data source.

value.span: 具有 屬性中指定之型別的物件，包含從資料來源擷取的資料。

span.span: An object of the type specified in the property that contains the data that was retrieved from the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用檢查針對資料來源中的目前值的原始值，以取消更新作業，或採取其他動作的屬性。You can use the property to check the original values against the current values in the data source and to cancel the update operation or take other action. 屬性包含值，只有在檢視中保存的屬性狀態在網頁中。The property contains values for only the properties that are persisted in view state in the Web page. 屬性會保存在這些情況下：A property is persisted under these circumstances: - 當它會顯示在資料繫結控制項中。When it is displayed in a data-bound control. - 當的屬性屬性設為`Always`或`WhenChanged`。When the property of the attribute is set to `Always` or `WhenChanged`. 如果屬性設定為`Never`並不會在資料繫結控制項中顯示的值，不會在網頁中儲存的值。If the property is set to `Never` and the value is not displayed in a data-bound control, the value is not stored in the Web page. 在此情況下，它無法指派給屬性。In that case, it cannot be assigned to the property. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 此範例顯示如何比較屬性從屬性和屬性來判斷是否中的值`Category`屬性已變更。The example shows how to compare properties from the property and the property to determine whether the value in the `Category` property has changed. 如果是的話`CategoryChanged`屬性中的物件屬性設定為`true`。If so, the `CategoryChanged` property of the object in the property is set to `true`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating/cs/Default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating/vb/Default.aspx.vb#1)]
